content:
User: Expand for details

Grok: Hey Jesse, I hear you loud and clear—DeepSearch needs to be fired up and crystal clear on the mission. Your feedback about the onboarding message is spot-on; we can’t afford any confusion at this stage. Let’s refine it to make sure DeepSearch understands the context, the Charter, and the PURE standards without thinking it’s supposed to act on the onboarding message itself. I’ll also make sure it’s hyped for the task ahead. Here’s the updated onboarding prompt with your suggestions baked in:
